heading: Check-In Starts (8:00 - 9:00am)
description: Team members collect their ID cards and team kits at the check-in desk.

heading: Opening Ceremony (09:00 - 09:45am)
description: Start the day with a welcome note.

heading: Workshop on uAgents (09:45 - 11:30am)
description: A hands-on technical session where participants learn and engage in development activities related to Fetch.ai, focusing on exploring its capabilities and potential applications.

heading: Fetch-A-Thon Begins (11:30 - 13:00pm)
description: Unleash your skills in our hackathon. Let creativity flow in the allotted time â€” code and conquer!

heading: Fun Activity 1 (18:00 - 18:30pm)
description: An engaging activity to lighten the mood and reinforce learning.

heading: Session-Rise IN (18:30 - 19:10pm)
description: Collect insights into emerging trends and technologies related to the hackathon theme of web3.

heading: Mentor Session I (21:30 - 22:00pm)
description: This is a non eliminative round. In this round mentors will check the progress of the hack. You can also discuss your ideas with mentors and can also take the inputs from them.

heading: Mentor Session II  (01:30 - 02:30am)
description: Guidance from mentors to address technical challenges and enhance project development. After this mentoring session, participants will also not be allowed to change their project after this.

heading: Fun Activity 2(03:00 - 03:30am)
description: Recreational activity for team building and a refreshing break.

heading: Breakfast (8:00 AM - 9:00am)
description: Start the day with a hearty breakfast.

heading: Workshop on Github (09:30 - 10:00am)
description: An interactive session focused on GitHub best practices, collaborative coding and hosting your projects.

heading: Submission Start (10:00 - 11:00am)
description: This is a reminder start wrapping up your things and start submitting your project on Rise In.

heading: Judging Round (11:30 - 12:30pm)
description: In this round selected teams will pitch their project to the panel of judges and in this round top two winners will be announced.

heading: Closing Ceremony Swags Distribution (12:30 - 13:30pm)
description: Tata Bye Bye Khatam Ho Gaya !!! [See You Next Time]
